standalone.text: Emma usually leaves the office at 6 p.m., but today she stayed until 8 to finish a report.
standalone.question: Why did Emma stay late?
choices: She was talking to a coworker

standalone.text: She __ in this company for five years.
We are looking for someone who is __ and can work independently.
They postponed the event __ the weather forecast.
Please send the report to me __ email.
The presentation was __ than I expected.
I will contact you __ I arrive at the airport.

passages.passage: Plastic pollution in the oceans has reached alarming levels. Millions of tons of plastic waste are dumped into the sea every year, threatening marine life. Sea turtles, for example, often mistake plastic bags for jellyfish and ingest them, leading to injury or death.

questions.text: What animal is specifically mentioned as being affected by plastic?
What do sea turtles confuse plastic with?

passages.passage: Urban farming is becoming increasingly popular as cities look for ways to produce food locally. Rooftop gardens, hydroponics, and vertical farming are some of the innovative techniques being used to grow vegetables in urban environments.

questions.text: Where is urban farming typically practiced?
Which method is NOT mentioned in the passage?

passages.passage: The Industrial Revolution marked a major turning point in history. It brought about the mechanization of production, rapid urbanization, and significant social changes. While it led to economic growth, it also created harsh working conditions in factories.

questions.text: What was one outcome of the Industrial Revolution?

long_passages.passage: Climate change is a complex issue influenced by natural and human factors. Scientists agree that human activities, particularly the burning of fossil fuels, are accelerating global warming. Changes in weather patterns, more extreme weather events, and rising sea levels are among the predicted consequences. Addressing this challenge requires global cooperation and sustainable practices.

questions.text: What is the main cause of accelerated global warming?
Which of the following is a consequence of climate change?
What is necessary to address climate change?
How do scientists view human impact on climate change?

long_passages.passage: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing many industries, from healthcare to transportation. In healthcare, AI can analyze patient data to assist in diagnosis and recommend treatment plans. In transportation, self-driving cars are being developed using AI algorithms. Despite its benefits, AI raises ethical questions about privacy and job displacement.

questions.text: What is one application of AI in healthcare?
How is AI used in transportation?
What is one concern about AI?
What is the tone of the passage regarding AI?
